item.title: Dragonfly River
item.description: The Dragonfly River is a short-lived tributary of the mighty Sellen River in south-central Avistan. It begins high in the Five Kings Mountains, approximately 60 miles southeast of the capital of Highhelm and flows from there in a general southeasterly direction south of the Andoren town of Caldamin where it enters the Verduran Forest. After approximately 120 miles, it flows into the Sellen south of the town of Bellis.[1]
